articles.title: WAR IN EUROPE: SA abstains on a UN General Assembly resolution condemning Russia…again - Daily Maverick
articles.description: South Africa abstained from a United Nations General Assembly resolution condemning Russia for its holding of referendums in four occupied Ukrainian provinces last month before annexing them to Russia.

articles.title: FINANCIAL ACTION TASK FORCE: Greylisting seems inevitable, but there are steps SA can take to mitigate the fallout - Daily Maverick
articles.description: An independent report by research firm Intellidex makes it clear that South Africa is unlikely to avoid greylisting and the focus should now be on minimising the impact. Intellidex rates South Africa’s chances of being greylisted in February at 85%.
